sentences.sContent: Every merchant, manufacturer, broker, or tradesman who gives a customer time to pay is really loaning his customer the money.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every merchant, manufacturer, broker, or tradesman who gives a customer time to pay is really loaning his customer the money.
sentences.sCn: 商人、制造商、经纪人或零售商如果给客户的支付留出了一定的时间，实际上就是在向客户提供信贷。

synos.tran: [贸易]商人；（英）店主；零售商；手艺人

trans.tranCn: 商人；（英）店主；零售商；手艺人
trans.tranOther: someone who buys and sells goods or services, especially in a shop
